attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the british have been plagued by the ipod breaking debacles of the iranian prince of death and destruction for too long!!!! rise up my friends and with your help we can free our honest land from the scurge that is SHAHIN

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
